DOC.brief_summary: This is a review of prostate biopsy specimens which show capsular penetration or positive surgical margins. Patients had surgery performed at William Beaumont Hospital-Royal Oak, Michigan.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study of Positive Biopsy Specimens on Patients Undergoing a Prostatectomy
DOC.criteria: Males having undergone surgery for prostate cancer at William Beaumont HospitalRoyal Oak, Michigan
